ProductInfo.Features:

<5> Canon Optical Cleaning Kit + <6> Transcend 64GB SDXC 10 Card + <7> Spare LP-E6 Battery + <8> Battery Charger for LP-E6 +
<9> Battery Grip for Canon 5D + <10> RC-6 Shutter Remote Control + <11> PD 77mm (UV/CPL/ND8) Filters + <12> PD HDMI to Mini-HDMI Cable +
<13> PD SDHC Memory Card Reader + <14> PD Deluxe Hurricane Blower + <15> PD 8 SD Card Memory Card Case + <16> LCD Screen Protectors
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS 5D Mark III Digital SLR Camera Body with 24-70mm f/4L IS USM Lens + 64GB Card + Grip + Battery & Charger + Case + Tripod Kit
